ActCanada Consumer Product Safety Act
SubjectRegulations Repealing the Asbestos Products Regulations
PrecisRegulations Repealing the ASBESTOS PRODUCTS REGULATIONS in order to protect human health by reducing exposure of Canadians to asbestos, and to meet international obligations.
